item.title: Use Gogh to color your terminal!
item.description: As mentioned in a previous note, I now use Atom together with Gnome Terminal for most of my coding and writing time and really enjoy my current setup. As I use two different applications, I have similar but slightly different color schemes, which, weirdly enough, has been bugging me for a while… That is why, a few days ago, I started to edit the color but looking a the them repository of the Atom theme I liked (e.g. Atom Material) when I came to realize that someone should have already found a simple way to install several geeky themes. Turns out I was correct (not the hardest guess admittedly), the name of this project is Gogh (I dare assume it is a reference to Vincent van Gogh) and it is awesome 😃!!
